snippet: Michael Pena, who was convicted of attacking a schoolteacher at gunpoint while off duty, was sentenced to three consecutive terms of 25 years to life in prison.
abstract: Justice Richard D Carruthers of State Supreme Court in Manhattan sentences former police officer Michael Pena to 75 years to life in prison for sexually assaulting a school teacher in Upper Manhattan; Pena is not convicted of rape.
lead_paragraph: Michael Pena, who was convicted of attacking a schoolteacher at gunpoint while off duty, was sentenced to three consecutive terms of 25 years to life in prison.

headline.seo: Ex-Officer Sentenced to 75 Years in Prison for Sexual Assault
headline.main: Ex-Officer Sentenced to 75 Years in Prison for Sexual Assault
headline.print_headline: Ex-Officer, Called ‘Vicious’ by Judge, Draws 75-Year Sentence in Sexual Attack on Teacher
